Empty.description: Empty model. Used as default value when no model is specified.

parameters.name: responseFormat
parameters.description: The response format. If the request has an input body, that body must also use the format specified in "responseFormat". Valid values include "json" and "xml" without the quotes. If the responseFormat isn't specified, the "accept" HTTP header shall be used to determine the format of the response. operations.summary: This method retrieves the calculation code details using the name assigned to the calculation code.

parameters.name: responseFormat
parameters.description: The response format. If the request has an input body, that body must also use the format specified in "responseFormat". Valid values include "json" and "xml" without the quotes. If the responseFormat isn't specified, the "accept" HTTP header shall be used to determine the format of the response. If the "accept" HTTP header isn't specified as well, the default response format shall be in json.

parameters.name: storeId
parameters.description: The store identifier.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: The currency code to use. Example usage : currency=USD. If no currency code is specified, the store default currency shall be used.

parameters.description: Profile name. Profiles determine the subset of data to be returned by a query.

parameters.description: The calculation usage ID.

parameters.name: qCode

parameters.description: The response format. If the request has an input body, that body must also use the format specified in "responseFormat". parameters.name: storeId
parameters.description: The store identifier.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: The currency code to use. Example usage : currency=USD. If no currency code is specified, the store default currency shall be used.

parameters.description: Profile name. Profiles determine the subset of data to be returned by a query.

parameters.name: qCalculationUsageId
parameters.description: The calculation usage ID.

parameters.name: qCategoryId
parameters.description: The category ID.

parameters.name: qCode
parameters.description: The calculation code name.

parameters.name: qEnableStorePath
parameters.description: Whether the data bean searches for calculation code based on store path. Default value is true.

parameters.name: qIncludeCategoryPromotions
parameters.description: Whether to exclude category promotions. Default value is false.

parameters.name: qIncludeNonManagementCenterPromotions
parameters.description: Whether all the promotions in the store have been created in Management Center. Default value is false

parameters.name: qIncludeParentCategories
parameters.description: Whether to retrieve the calculation codes attached to the parent category of the specified catalog group. Default value is false.

parameters.name: qIncludePromotionCode
parameters.description: Whether to exclude the calculation codes that require a promotion code. Default value is true.
